dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: Fine... You win..

dialogue.speaker: bf
dialogue.text: Yeah!

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: Just, go away! Please.

dialogue.speaker: generic
dialogue.text: Dave finally arrives at Bambi's Farm.

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: Oh shit!

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: Hey, I'm here. Sorry, I was running late.

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: Tristan was a pain to get up. He was like "But Dad.." this, "But Dad.." that.

dialogue.speaker: tristan
dialogue.text: Don't talk about me like I'm not here!

dialogue.speaker: gf
dialogue.text: You have a son? How adorable!

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: Oh yeah, and he's a great kid! Isn't that right, bud?

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: Dave, these trespassers ruined my day! Can you please get them out of here!

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: Are you serious, Bambi? They're my friends! Picnic, remember?

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: Wait...

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: Yeah, sorry about Bambi's behavior, guys. He tends to get a bit defensive when you step onto his property...

dialogue.speaker: gf
dialogue.text: Hah, we're well aware.

dialogue.speaker: bf
dialogue.text: Skedoo bop.

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: Oh. Ohhh, ohhhhhh!

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: SO I GOT ANGRY AND BROKE MY PHONE OVER NOTHING?

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: I'M SO STUPID! ...And just a little sorry.

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: It's okay Bambi, everyone makes mistakes from time to time!

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: Even very stupid ones that could've easily been averted.

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: I see straight through your sarcasm!

dialogue.speaker: gf
dialogue.text: Alright everyone, how about we get this picnic started!

dialogue.speaker: tristan
dialogue.text: Oh heck yeah, food!

dialogue.speaker: bf
dialogue.text: Beep!

dialogue.speaker: generic
dialogue.text: [Everyone eventually settles down and has a nice picnic together.]
